definition: to file for investigation/to prosecute (a case)
to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)

sentences.english: Procuratorates also supervised the public security organs in investigation of 5 IPR infringement crimes.
sentences.chinese: 监督公安机关立案侦查侵犯知识产权犯罪案件5件。

sentences.english: This case should be put on file for investigation and prosecution.
sentences.chinese: 检察院已经立案侦查此事。

definition: to transfer (a case, a person, files etc)
to raise a charge/to sue/to institute proceedings
to register (to an official organism)/to file a case (for investigation)
release from custody, subject to provision of a surety, pending investigation (PRC)
to detain as criminal/criminal detention/abbr. for 刑事拘留[xing2 shi4 ju1 liu2]
to bring to justice/to file away (a document)
to be a suspect (in a crime)/to be suspected of
residential surveillance, a form of noncustodial house arrest
